TheSimpletonMod:Aerate.NAME: Aerate
TheSimpletonMod:Aerate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Plant !M! of your newest Crop

TheSimpletonMod:BabyTurnip.NAME: Baby Turnip
TheSimpletonMod:BabyTurnip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

TheSimpletonMod:Barnstorm.NAME: Barnstorm
TheSimpletonMod:Barnstorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each Crop stack you have. NL Crops at Maturity deal double damage.
TheSimpletonMod:Barnstorm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies for each Crop stack you have. NL Crops at Maturity deal double damage.

TheSimpletonMod:Biorefinement.NAME: Biorefinement
TheSimpletonMod:Biorefinement.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Harvest card for the first time each turn, gain [E].

TheSimpletonMod:BirdFeeder.NAME: Birdfeeder
TheSimpletonMod:BirdFeeder.DESCRIPTION: The next !M! times you play a Power card this combat, heal

TheSimpletonMod:ControlledBurn.NAME: Controlled Burn
TheSimpletonMod:ControlledBurn.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Burning. NL Exhaust if the enemy didn't already have Burning.

TheSimpletonMod:CropDiversity.NAME: Crop Diversity
TheSimpletonMod:CropDiversity.DESCRIPTION: Add 1 of !M! random Crop Power cards to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

TheSimpletonMod:CropRotation.NAME: Crop Rotation
TheSimpletonMod:CropRotation.DESCRIPTION: Harvest !M! random Crop stack. NL Gain a random Crop Power card.
TheSimpletonMod:CropRotation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Harvest !M! random Crop stack. NL Gain a random Crop Power card. It costs 1 less this turn.

TheSimpletonMod:CullingStrike.NAME: Culling Strike
TheSimpletonMod:CullingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you've Harvested this turn, deal !D! damage again

TheSimpletonMod:Cultivate.NAME: Cultivate
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: of each Crop, then Plant !M! of each Crop you Harvested. NL Exhaust.

TheSimpletonMod:Depletion.NAME: Depletion
TheSimpletonMod:Depletion.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! less Energy next turn. NL Draw !M! less card next turn. NL Exhaust. NL NL At the end of your turn, if this is in your hand, add a copy of it to your discard pile.

TheSimpletonMod:Nettles.NAME: Nettles
TheSimpletonMod:Nettles.DESCRIPTION: When you draw this, add 1 thorns to a random enemy.

TheSimpletonMod:DesperatePlunge.NAME: Desperate Plunge
TheSimpletonMod:DesperatePlunge.DESCRIPTION: Costs [E] less for each Power card played this turn. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, lose [E].

TheSimpletonMod:DigIn.NAME: Dig In
TheSimpletonMod:DigIn.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Add a Depletion to your discard pile.

TheSimpletonMod:DoubleBarrel.NAME: Double Barrel
TheSimpletonMod:DoubleBarrel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is Weak, gain [E] and deal !D! damage again.

TheSimpletonMod:FanTheFlames.NAME: Fan the Flames
TheSimpletonMod:FanTheFlames.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Burning, then double the enemy's Burning.

TheSimpletonMod:Ferment.NAME: Ferment
TheSimpletonMod:Ferment.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 2 cards from your hand into your draw pile. NL Gain !M! Energy.
TheSimpletonMod:Ferment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 2 cards from your hand into your draw pile, then draw a card. NL Gain !M! Energy.

TheSimpletonMod:Fertilaser.NAME: Fertilaser
TheSimpletonMod:Fertilaser.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Plant !M! more of each Crop.

TheSimpletonMod:FlamingSpud.NAME: Flaming Spud
TheSimpletonMod:FlamingSpud.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Burning. NL Exhaust.

TheSimpletonMod:FlashPasteurize.NAME: Flash Pasteurize
TheSimpletonMod:FlashPasteurize.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL characters. NL Remove all of your Debuffs. NL Exhaust.
TheSimpletonMod:FlashPasteurize.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL characters. NL Remove all of your Debuffs. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

TheSimpletonMod:GoToMarket.NAME: Go to Market
TheSimpletonMod:GoToMarket.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card for each different type of Crop you have.

TheSimpletonMod:Haymaker.NAME: Haymaker
TheSimpletonMod:Haymaker.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Apply
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

TheSimpletonMod:HitTheSack.NAME: Hit the Sack
TheSimpletonMod:HitTheSack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Plant X Potatoes.
TheSimpletonMod:HitTheSack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X+1 times. NL Plant X+1 Potatoes.

TheSimpletonMod:Husk.NAME: Husk
TheSimpletonMod:Husk.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

TheSimpletonMod:Mulch.NAME: Mulch
TheSimpletonMod:Mulch.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card, then gain an effect based on its type: NL NL Attack: Gain !B! Block. NL Skill: Apply
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Burning to ALL. NL All Others: Draw

TheSimpletonMod:OnionBloom.NAME: Onion Bloom
TheSimpletonMod:OnionBloom.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Plant !M! Onion. Draw a card. NL Discard a card. NL Exhaust.
TheSimpletonMod:OnionBloom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Plant !M! Onion. Draw a card. NL Discard a card.

TheSimpletonMod:PestManagement.NAME: Pest Management
TheSimpletonMod:PestManagement.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL  Next turn, gain !B! Block.

TheSimpletonMod:Photosynthesis.NAME: Photosynthesis
TheSimpletonMod:Photosynthesis.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, spend all your unused Energy and Plant that many random Crops.

TheSimpletonMod:Pruning.NAME: Pruning
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: of your oldest Crop, then Plant !M! stacks

TheSimpletonMod:ReapAndSow.NAME: Reap and Sow
TheSimpletonMod:ReapAndSow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Plant !M! Potatoes, then add a Cultivate to your discard pile if you have any Mature Crops.
TheSimpletonMod:ReapAndSow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Plant !M! Potatoes, then add an upgraded Cultivate to your discard pile if you have any Mature Crops.

TheSimpletonMod:ResearchGrant.NAME: ResearchGrant
TheSimpletonMod:ResearchGrant.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! copies of Soil Sample to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

TheSimpletonMod:RootDown.NAME: Root Down
TheSimpletonMod:RootDown.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Turnips are Mature, Harvest all Turnips. Otherwise, Plant !M! Turnips.
TheSimpletonMod:RootDown.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Deal !D! damage. NL If Turnips are Mature, Harvest all Turnips. Otherwise, Plant !M! Turnips.

TheSimpletonMod:RootOut.NAME: Root Out
TheSimpletonMod:RootOut.DESCRIPTION: All enemies gain !M! Vulnerable. NL Harvest all Turnips. NL Exhaust.

TheSimpletonMod:Rototilling.NAME: Rototilling
TheSimpletonMod:Rototilling.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Exhaust a card from your hand.

TheSimpletonMod:SaltTheEarth.NAME: Salt the Earth
TheSimpletonMod:SaltTheEarth.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Add !M! Depletions to your hand.

TheSimpletonMod:SoilSample.NAME: Soil Sample
TheSimpletonMod:SoilSample.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle up to !M! cards from your discard pile into your draw pile, then draw a card. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
TheSimpletonMod:SoilSample.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle up to !M! cards from your discard pile into your draw pile, then Draw a card. It costs 0 this turn.

TheSimpletonMod:SpudMissile.NAME: Spud
TheSimpletonMod:SpudMissile.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

TheSimpletonMod:StockTheCellar.NAME: Stock the Cellar
TheSimpletonMod:StockTheCellar.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Each time this is card shuffled into your draw pile, increase its Block by !M! for this combat.

TheSimpletonMod:Swelter.NAME: Swelter
TheSimpletonMod:Swelter.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Weak and !M! Burning. NL Gain !B! Block.
TheSimpletonMod:Swelter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 2 Weak and !M! Burning. NL Gain !B! Block.

TheSimpletonMod:Sunchoke.NAME: Sunchoke
TheSimpletonMod:Sunchoke.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Each Weak enemy that takes damage also gains !M! Burning.

TheSimpletonMod:TillTheField.NAME: Till the Field
TheSimpletonMod:TillTheField.DESCRIPTION: If your newest Crop is Mature, gain !B! Block. Otherwise, Plant !M! of that Crop.

TheSimpletonMod:ToughSkin.NAME: Tough Skin
TheSimpletonMod:ToughSkin.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Harvest a Crop, gain !M! Block.

TheSimpletonMod:ToughenUp.NAME: Toughen Up
TheSimpletonMod:ToughenUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you have any Squash, Plant  !M! Squash.

TheSimpletonMod:VineRipen.NAME: Vine Ripen
TheSimpletonMod:VineRipen.DESCRIPTION: Plant !M! Squash. NL If Squash is Mature, Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.
TheSimpletonMod:VineRipen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Plant !M! Squash. NL If Squash is Mature, Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.

TheSimpletonMod:VolatileFumes.NAME: Volatile Fumes
TheSimpletonMod:VolatileFumes.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you attack an enemy with Weak, apply !M! Burning.
